edu.utah.bmi.ibiomes.local

Interface LocalDirectory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    LocalExperiment
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AMBERCollection, CHARMMCollection, DefaultLocalExperimentImpl, GAMESSCollection, GaussianCollection, GROMACSCollection, LocalDirectoryImpl, LocalExperimentImpl, NAMDCollection, NWChemCollection

    public interface LocalDirectory
    Interface to handle local file collections that need to be published into iRODS.
    Author:
    Julien Thibault

      • copyAndRegisterFolder

        void copyAndRegisterFolder(java.lang.String irodsCollectionPath,
                         org.irods.jargon.core.pub.IRODSAccessObjectFactory aoFactory,
                         org.irods.jargon.core.connection.IRODSAccount irodsAccount,
                         boolean overwrite)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Copy files to iRODS server and register simulation derived-data files.
        Parameters:
        irodsCollectionPath - Virtual path to the collection
        overwrite - Overwrite existing collection or not
        aoFactory - IRODS file system access object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • registerFolder

        void registerFolder(java.lang.String irodsCollectionPath,
                  org.irods.jargon.core.pub.IRODSAccessObjectFactory aoFactory,
                  org.irods.jargon.core.connection.IRODSAccount irodsAccount,
                  boolean force)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Add biomolecular simulation metadata to a registered collection by parsing the files locally. This should be used when the collection was created with iRODS (through ireg or iput) outside iBIOMES. This will only add metadata, and keep existing files in place.
        Parameters:
        irodsCollectionPath - Virtual path to the collection
        aoFactory - IRODS file system access object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
